content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Through regular contact with our colleagues, we can support each other and reduce the feeling of isolation and disconnect. Modern technology allows us to stay in regular contact with our distributed teams via video calls, chat, etc.  and provides an online space where you can share your experiences, get necessary information, and support, and thus encourage healthy and supportive collaborations.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
